metadata.title: CVE-2020-8516 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: ** DISPUTED ** The daemon in Tor through 0.4.1.8 and 0.4.2.x through 0.4.2.6 does not verify that a rendezvous node is known before attempting to connect to it, which might make it easier for remote attackers to discover circuit information. NOTE: The network team of Tor claims this is an intended behavior and not a vulnerability.

criterions.comment: tor package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
